item.stardew_fishing.trap_bobber.tooltip: Causes fish to escape slower when you aren't reeling them in
item.stardew_fishing.cork_bobber.tooltip: Slightly increases the size of your "fishing bar", making it easier to catch fish
item.stardew_fishing.sonar_bobber.toolti: Shows what fish is on the line before it's caught
item.stardew_fishing.treasure_bobber.too: Fish don't escape while collecting treasures. Also slightly increases the chance to find treasures
item.stardew_fishing.quality_bobber.tool: Greatly increases experience gained from fishing
item.stardew_fishing.quality_bobber.qual: Also boosts the Quality of fish that you catch
